Is that a joke or is it serious?

<* Snow Tech and Shadow Cat walked cautiously into the
Ark. They stood for a moment in the door-way, getting
used to the artificial light. They walked down
corridors and hallways, looking for someone to ask,
basically, where they where. They stopped and decided
to take a more direct approach,*

 " Computer, track spark signature to exact location"

 * The computer beeped and ran a series of complex
codes that only Snow Tech and Shadow Cat knew. It then
showed a hologram of all the spark signatures in the
Ark. One in particular spark was zoomed in, but it
looked really different to Snow Tech, he turned to his
sister and asked,*

 " Uh, does Iron have two sparks?"

 * Shadow Cat frowned and grabbed the small computer
from Snow Tech. Looking at it quickly turned from a
frown to a surprised look to a smirk. She turned to
Snow Tech,*

 " Haven't you ever heard of the Sprockets and the
diodes?"(Birds and the Bees)

 * Snow Tech's eyes went wide and he screwed up his
face, stuck out his tounge and said,*

 " Ewwwww! Tha's Gross! This place has made Inny
soft.!"

 *They quickly decided to search out the leader of
this group rather than their long-lost friend at this instant.*>
